main event: On 13 October 1957, students observed a possibly balloon-shaped object emitting a high-pitched humming sound while oscillating in the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as ball-shaped and emitted a high-pitched humming sound., It appeared to oscillate up and down, dividing its top and bottom., Witnesses included 15 to 20 students from Alma College., The sighting occurred approximately 3 to 7 miles from St. Charles Church., Weather conditions were clear with slight winds.
